delete.title: Delete my user account
delete.description: After you click  "Delete user account", you will receive the confirmation message to your e-mail address. Follow the link in the message to confirm account deletion.
delete.notice: I understand that my account will be deleted and I will not be able to create requests through CompanyAccount.
delete.success: Follow the link in the message to confirm account deletion.

confirm.title: Delete account
confirm.text: You are going to delete your account. Access to CompanyAccount will be blocked after you click the link in the confirmation message.

deleteCompany.title: Delete company account
deleteCompany.description: After you click  "Delete company", the confirmation message will be sent to your e-mail address. Follow the link in the message to confirm account deletion.
deleteCompany.notice: I understand that after deleting the company account all information about the company will become unavailable.
deleteCompany.success: The confirmation message has been sent to your e-mail address.

errors.Success: Follow the link in the message to confirm account deletion.
errors.RepeatedDeactivation: Follow the link in the message once again to confirm account deletion.
errors.UnknownError: Failed to delete the company. Please try again.
